```{r}

```
```{r}
gold <- read.csv("Gold Price.csv")
```

```{r}

gold <- gold[order(gold$Date),]
```

```{r}
tail(gold)
```

```{r}
plot(gold$Date, gold$Price)
```
```{r}
#gold price statistics

```
